ygData.subject: Re: Everfrost merchants?
ygData.msgSnippet: Where s the dungeons in permafrost? Later Chris ... From: gkays@seatac.net  To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Where's the dungeons in permafrost?

Later
Chris


-----Original Message-----
From: gkays@... <gkays@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 6:00 PM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Everfrost merchants?


>From: <gkays@...>
>
>I discovered the joys of the dungeon of Permafrost last night. It is
appropriate for parties of adventurers level 15 and above and is not
crowded. (15 was maximum there last night). But guards in Halas and
Everfrost will KoS me, and the nearest merchant that I know of that will
sell to me is in Qeynos Hills. Does anyone know if there is a merchant in
Everfrost that will sell to evils? Me a TSK.
>
>Scragg of Bristlebane
